messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have sent Steve, From Centcom. to go check out how you're doing

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Quartermaster's Office.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Hey. we're not seeing Steve's lifesigns... waht the fuck guys.. he was so likeable
Dammit...
You killed him

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
